alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:05PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison, east central Limestone and south central Lincoln Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 305 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or near Meridianville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Huntsville, Meridianville, Moores Mill, Hazel Green, Harvest, Toney, Elkwood, Fisk and Taft. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
